# ShinyShowCase GitHub

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides a Shiny app to showcase packages and functions in a Shiny app. The app is designed to be used in a Shiny app, but can also be used in a standalone R session.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ShinyShowCase from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("edgar-treischl/ShinyShowCase")
```
